mapper.select: select a.gender_name, a.cnt * 1.00 / b.tot_usr from ( select gender , case when gender = 1 then '男' when gender = 2 then '女' else '其它' end as gender_name , count() as cnt from haylou_datawares.dim_usr_info_his_dfs group by gender ) a, (select count() as tot_usr from haylou_datawares.dim_usr_info_his_dfs) b

select oo.fd_age_desc, oo.cnt * 1.0 / kk.tot_usr_cnt as age_ratio from ( select case when aa.fd_age = 1 then '17岁以下' when aa.fd_age = 2 then '18-24' when aa.fd_age = 3 then '25-30' when aa.fd_age = 4 then '31-35' when aa.fd_age = 5 then '36-40' when aa.fd_age = 6 then '41以上' end as fd_age_desc, count() as cnt from ( select dateDiff('year', birthday, toDate('2021-10-01')) as age, case when age <= 17 then 1 when age >= 18 and age <= 24 then 2 when age >= 25 and age <= 30 then 3 when age >= 31 and age <= 35 then 4 when age >= 36 and age <= 40 then 5 else 6 end as fd_age from haylou_datawares.dim_usr_info_his_dfs ) aa group by aa.fd_age
) oo, (select count() as tot_usr_cnt from haylou_datawares.dim_usr_info_his_dfs bb) kk order by fd_age_desc asc
select count() as tot_users from haylou_datawares.dim_usr_info_his_dfs
select regis_country, count() as reg_cnt from haylou_datawares.dim_usr_info_his_dfs group by regis_country

select count() as regist_cnt from haylou_datawares.dim_usr_info_his_dfs where pdate < toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(now()))) and pdate >= toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -1))))
